name: Klotz AR
description:
Be creative and try yourself as a builder. Stack blocks of different sizes on each other and see if your construction holds or not.

We have come up with some ideas so that you do not get bored while building. Construct whole buildings and castles with just one tap.

Remove individual elements or detonate a bomb to destroy your artwork.

The app has various operating modes and offers numerous elements for control. For this you only have to turn the selection wheel.

- 9 blocks
- 11 presets
- Push Tool
- Removal Tool
- Explosive
- Spectator Mode
- Settings

As always we wish you a lot of fun with this AR experience.
